ActPayments in Lieu of Taxes Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHEL DOYON, Q.C., of Qu√©bec, Quebec, to be a member of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years; and appointment of MICHEL DOYON, Q.C., a member of the advisory panel, as Chairperson of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel, effective June 20, 2008.
